020package com.bewsoftware.utils;
021
022/**
023 * This would be used when ever an indexation process has failed.
024 *
025 * @author <a href="mailto:bw.opensource@yahoo.com">Bradley Willcott</a>
026 *
027 * @since 1.0.9
028 * @version 1.0.9
029 */
030public class ReindexFailedException extends RuntimeException
031{
032
033    /**
034     * For serialization.
035     */
036    private static final long serialVersionUID = 3209096141532094223L;
037
038    /**
039     * Initializes a new instance of the {@linkplain ReindexFailedException} class.
040     */
041    public ReindexFailedException()
042    {
043    }
044
045    /**
046     * Initializes a new instance of the {@linkplain ReindexFailedException} class.
047     *
048     * @param message the message that describes the error
049     */
050    public ReindexFailedException(String message)
051    {
052        super(message);
053    }
054
055    /**
056     * Initializes a new instance of the {@linkplain ReindexFailedException} class.
057     *
058     * @param message the message that describes the error
059     * @param cause   the exception that is the cause of the current exception, or
060     *                a {@code null} reference if no inner exception is specified
061     */
062    public ReindexFailedException(String message, Throwable cause)
063    {
064        super(message, cause);
065    }
066
067    /**
068     * Initializes a new instance of the {@linkplain ReindexFailedException} class.
069     *
070     * @param cause the exception that is the cause of the current exception, or
071     *              a {@code null} reference if no inner exception is specified
072     */
073    public ReindexFailedException(Throwable cause)
074    {
075        super(cause);
076    }
077}
